title: Trump Token's 85% Weekly Surge Defies Democrats' Call for Impeachment, Massive Unlocks
short_summary: Democratic lawmakers cite the president’s involvement with the token as potential grounds for impeachment. Sen. Jon Ossoff (D-Ga.) pointed to the crypto project offering its top holders an invitation to a dinner event with President Trump
long_summary: Democratic lawmakers cite the president’s involvement with the token as potential grounds for impeachment. Sen. Jon Ossoff (D-Ga.) pointed to the crypto project offering its top holders an invitation to a dinner event with President Trump. The memecoin surged over 70% after the event was announced and has already been up 85% over the last seven days. title: Bitcoin Poised for Strongest Weekly Gain Since Trump Win as ETFs Gobble $2.7B Inflows
short_summary: Bitcoin (BTC) continued its spring rally on Friday and is on track for its strongest weekly showing since Trump's election victory. The largest and oldest cryptocurrency held around $95,000 during U.S. afternoon hours, up 1.
long_summary: Bitcoin (BTC) continued its spring rally on Friday and is on track for its strongest weekly showing since Trump's election victory. The largest and oldest cryptocurrency held around $95,000 during U.S. afternoon hours, up 1.8% over the past 24 hours. Sui’s native (SUI), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), and Hedera's HBAR also led gains in the broad-market crypto benchmark CoinDesk 20 Index. Today's gains cap an exceptional momentum for crypto markets recovering from the early April lows amid tariff turmoil.

title: DOGE Mining Firm Z Squared To Go Public Through Merger
short_summary: Z Squared, a firm that specializes in mining dogecoin (DOGE), is merging with biopharmaceutical company Coeptis (COEP) The merger will enable the resulting company to keep DOGE mining operations
long_summary: Z Squared, a firm that specializes in mining dogecoin (DOGE), is merging with biopharmaceutical company Coeptis (COEP) Z Squared will become one of the largest publicly-traded companies with a primary focus mining DOGE and other cryptocurrencies like litecoin (LTC) The merger is expected to close in the third quarter of 2025, and the combined entity will have 9,000 U.S.-based DOGe mining machines. COEP is down 37.5% on the day.

title: Stablecoins Could Bring 'ChatGPT' Moment to Blockchain Adoption, Hit $3.7T by 2030: Citi
short_summary: Global bank Citi has predicted 2025 could be a possible inflection point for blockchain adoption. At the center of the Citi's projection are stablecoins, a class of cryptocurrencies pegged to traditional currencies like the U.S. dollar.
long_summary: Global bank Citi has predicted 2025 could be a possible inflection point for blockchain adoption driven by stablecoins. Citi sees the asset class potentially growing to $1.6 trillion by 2030 in its base case from the current $230 billion. A major catalyst is the supportive regulatory stance in the U.S., with a recent presidential executive order directing the formation of a federal framework for digital assets. The clarity around stablecoin rules could allow these tokens to be more deeply embedded in the financial system.

title: Dinner With the U.S. President? All You Need Is $420 Worth of TRUMP
short_summary: The team behind the Trump memecoin said Thursday that the top 220 holders on its list are eligible to win dinner with President Donald Trump. Some users on X claimed that only holders with more than $300,000 in tokens could participate
long_summary: The team behind the Trump memecoin said Thursday that the top 220 holders on its list are eligible to win dinner with President Donald Trump. Some users on X claimed that only holders with more than $300,000 in tokens could participate. The team dismissed both claims, stating that users must register via the official leaderboard and that only time-weighted holdings during the competition will count. Trump surged 70% this week, trading at around $12 as of Thursday, mainly driven by hype around the so-called “Dinner with Trump” event.
